Mewdeko Docs

Class GlobalPermissionService

Provides a service for managing global permissions, allowing for the blocking of specific commands and modules.

Inheritance

Implements

Reset()

Resets all global permissions, clearing both the command and module block lists.

Declaration
public Task Reset()
Returns
Type Description
Task
| Edit this page View Source

ToggleCommand(string)

Toggles the blocking status of a command. If the command is currently blocked, it will be unblocked, and vice versa.

Declaration
public bool ToggleCommand(string commandName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string commandName

The name of the command to toggle, in lowercase.
Returns
Type Description
bool

True if the command was added to the blocked list, false if it was removed.
| Edit this page View Source

ToggleModule(string)

Toggles the blocking status of a module. If the module is currently blocked, it will be unblocked, and vice versa.

Declaration
public bool ToggleModule(string moduleName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string moduleName

The name of the module to toggle, in lowercase.
Returns
Type Description
bool

True if the module was added to the blocked list, false if it was removed.
| Edit this page View Source

TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, ICommandContext, string, CommandInfo)

Attempts to block the execution of a command based on global permissions settings.

Declaration
public Task<bool> TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient client, ICommandContext ctx, string moduleName, CommandInfo command)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client instance.
ICommandContext ctx

The command context.
string moduleName

The name of the module containing the command.
CommandInfo command

The command being executed.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that resolves to true if the command should be blocked; otherwise, false.
| Edit this page View Source

TryBlockLate(DiscordSocketClient, IInteractionContext, ICommandInfo)
